comments.body: We could in theory use only one migration here since nobody has any historical data on oracle. However, keeping the two in sync seems easier to understand.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +2,6 @@-- SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0

-- Running trigger table.
create table running_triggers(
  -- a UUID generated by the service

comments.body: 1000 is somewhat arbitrary. There is no length limit on module name and trigger name. Oracle really does not like unlimited length (there are options but they all suck). The JSON API and canton also use somewhat arbitrary limits here.
